import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function ViewListBlog({blog,deletePost, showModal, setShowModal}) { return (<>
Title: {blog.title}

Description: {blog.description}

Edit {/* Delete Modal */}
{showModal && <>
{/*content*/}
{/*header*/}

Want to delete?

{/*footer*/}
} ) } export default ViewListBlog
